a.n: The Philpott Fire: 5 Years On I (1)

p.k: In May 2012, Mick Philpott started a fire in his own house which killed six of his children. He was jailed for life for manslaughter. With new interviews with Philpott's son, close family, friends and neighbours, this new documentary looks at the impact of the horrific fire that killed six innocent children.
